GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
staging: vme_user: Fix possible UAF in tsi148_dma_list_add

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 5d2b286eb034af114f67d9967fc3fbc1829bb712, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit b2383c90a9d691201b9aee557776694cde86a935. For more details please see the references link.
